00088 ModifierData *ED_object_modifier_add(ReportList *reports, Main *bmain, Scene *scene, Object *ob, const char *name, int type)
00089 {
00090     ModifierData *md=NULL, *new_md=NULL;
00091     ModifierTypeInfo *mti = modifierType_getInfo(type);
00092     
00093     /* only geometry objects should be able to get modifiers [#25291] */
00094     if (!ELEM5(ob->type, OB_MESH, OB_CURVE, OB_SURF, OB_FONT, OB_LATTICE)) {
00095         BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_WARNING, "Modifiers cannot be added to Object '%s'", ob->id.name+2);
00096         return NULL;
00097     }
00098     
00099     if (mti->flags&eModifierTypeFlag_Single) {
00100         if (modifiers_findByType(ob, type)) {
00101             BKE_report(reports, RPT_WARNING, "Only one modifier of this type allowed");
00102             return NULL;
00103         }
00104     }
00105     
00106     if (type == eModifierType_ParticleSystem) {
00107         /* don't need to worry about the new modifier's name, since that is set to the number
00108          * of particle systems which shouldn't have too many duplicates 
00109          */
00110         new_md = object_add_particle_system(scene, ob, name);
00111     }
00112     else {
00113         /* get new modifier data to add */
00114         new_md= modifier_new(type);
00115         
00116         if (mti->flags&eModifierTypeFlag_RequiresOriginalData) {
00117             md = ob->modifiers.first;
00118             
00119             while (md && modifierType_getInfo(md->type)->type==eModifierTypeType_OnlyDeform)
00120                 md = md->next;
00121             
00122             BLI_insertlinkbefore(&ob->modifiers, md, new_md);
00123         }
00124         else
00125             BLI_addtail(&ob->modifiers, new_md);
00126 
00127         if (name)
00128             BLI_strncpy(new_md->name, name, sizeof(new_md->name));
00129 
00130         /* make sure modifier data has unique name */
00131 
00132         modifier_unique_name(&ob->modifiers, new_md);
00133         
00134         /* special cases */
00135         if (type == eModifierType_Softbody) {
00136             if (!ob->soft) {
00137                 ob->soft= sbNew(scene);
00138                 ob->softflag |= OB_SB_GOAL|OB_SB_EDGES;
00139             }
00140         }
00141         else if (type == eModifierType_Collision) {
00142             if (!ob->pd)
00143                 ob->pd= object_add_collision_fields(0);
00144             
00145             ob->pd->deflect= 1;
00146             DAG_scene_sort(bmain, scene);
00147         }
00148         else if (type == eModifierType_Surface)
00149             DAG_scene_sort(bmain, scene);
00150         else if (type == eModifierType_Multires)
00151             /* set totlvl from existing MDISPS layer if object already had it */
00152             multiresModifier_set_levels_from_disps((MultiresModifierData *)new_md, ob);
00153     }
00154 
00155     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00156 
00157     return new_md;
00158 }
00159 
00160 static int object_modifier_remove(Object *ob, ModifierData *md, int *sort_depsgraph)
00161 {
00162     ModifierData *obmd;
00163 
00164     /* It seems on rapid delete it is possible to
00165      * get called twice on same modifier, so make
00166      * sure it is in list. */
00167     for (obmd=ob->modifiers.first; obmd; obmd=obmd->next)
00168         if (obmd==md)
00169             break;
00170 
00171     if (!obmd)
00172         return 0;
00173 
00174     /* special cases */
00175     if (md->type == eModifierType_ParticleSystem) {
00176         ParticleSystemModifierData *psmd=(ParticleSystemModifierData*)md;
00177 
00178         BLI_remlink(&ob->particlesystem, psmd->psys);
00179         psys_free(ob, psmd->psys);
00180         psmd->psys= NULL;
00181     }
00182     else if (md->type == eModifierType_Softbody) {
00183         if (ob->soft) {
00184             sbFree(ob->soft);
00185             ob->soft= NULL;
00186             ob->softflag= 0;
00187         }
00188     }
00189     else if (md->type == eModifierType_Collision) {
00190         if (ob->pd)
00191             ob->pd->deflect= 0;
00192 
00193         *sort_depsgraph = 1;
00194     }
00195     else if (md->type == eModifierType_Surface) {
00196         if (ob->pd && ob->pd->shape == PFIELD_SHAPE_SURFACE)
00197             ob->pd->shape = PFIELD_SHAPE_PLANE;
00198 
00199         *sort_depsgraph = 1;
00200     }
00201     else if (md->type == eModifierType_Smoke) {
00202         ob->dt = OB_TEXTURE;
00203     }
00204     else if (md->type == eModifierType_Multires) {
00205         int ok= 1;
00206         ModifierData *tmpmd;
00207 
00208         /* ensure MDISPS CustomData layer isn't used by another multires modifiers */
00209         for (tmpmd= ob->modifiers.first; tmpmd; tmpmd= tmpmd->next)
00210             if (tmpmd!=md && tmpmd->type == eModifierType_Multires) {
00211                 ok= 0;
00212                 break;
00213             }
00214 
00215         if (ok) {
00216             multires_customdata_delete(ob->data);
00217         }
00218     }
00219 
00220     if (ELEM(md->type, eModifierType_Softbody, eModifierType_Cloth) &&
00221         ob->particlesystem.first == NULL) {
00222         ob->mode &= ~OB_MODE_PARTICLE_EDIT;
00223     }
00224 
00225     BLI_remlink(&ob->modifiers, md);
00226     modifier_free(md);
00227 
00228     return 1;
00229 }
00230 
00231 int ED_object_modifier_remove(ReportList *reports, Main *bmain, Scene *scene, Object *ob, ModifierData *md)
00232 {
00233     int sort_depsgraph = 0;
00234     int ok;
00235 
00236     ok= object_modifier_remove(ob, md, &sort_depsgraph);
00237 
00238     if (!ok) {
00239         BKE_reportf(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Modifier '%s' not in object '%s'", ob->id.name, md->name);
00240         return 0;
00241     }
00242 
00243     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00244 
00245     /* sorting has to be done after the update so that dynamic systems can react properly */
00246     if (sort_depsgraph)
00247         DAG_scene_sort(bmain, scene);
00248 
00249     return 1;
00250 }
00251 
00252 void ED_object_modifier_clear(Main *bmain, Scene *scene, Object *ob)
00253 {
00254     ModifierData *md = ob->modifiers.first;
00255     int sort_depsgraph = 0;
00256 
00257     if (!md)
00258         return;
00259 
00260     while (md) {
00261         ModifierData *next_md;
00262 
00263         next_md= md->next;
00264 
00265         object_modifier_remove(ob, md, &sort_depsgraph);
00266 
00267         md= next_md;
00268     }
00269 
00270     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00271 
00272     /* sorting has to be done after the update so that dynamic systems can react properly */
00273     if (sort_depsgraph)
00274         DAG_scene_sort(bmain, scene);
00275 }
00276 
00277 int ED_object_modifier_move_up(ReportList *reports, Object *ob, ModifierData *md)
00278 {
00279     if (md->prev) {
00280         ModifierTypeInfo *mti = modifierType_getInfo(md->type);
00281 
00282         if (mti->type!=eModifierTypeType_OnlyDeform) {
00283             ModifierTypeInfo *nmti = modifierType_getInfo(md->prev->type);
00284 
00285             if (nmti->flags&eModifierTypeFlag_RequiresOriginalData) {
00286                 BKE_report(reports, RPT_WARNING, "Cannot move above a modifier requiring original data");
00287                 return 0;
00288             }
00289         }
00290 
00291         BLI_remlink(&ob->modifiers, md);
00292         BLI_insertlink(&ob->modifiers, md->prev->prev, md);
00293     }
00294 
00295     return 1;
00296 }
00297 
00298 int ED_object_modifier_move_down(ReportList *reports, Object *ob, ModifierData *md)
00299 {
00300     if (md->next) {
00301         ModifierTypeInfo *mti = modifierType_getInfo(md->type);
00302 
00303         if (mti->flags&eModifierTypeFlag_RequiresOriginalData) {
00304             ModifierTypeInfo *nmti = modifierType_getInfo(md->next->type);
00305 
00306             if (nmti->type!=eModifierTypeType_OnlyDeform) {
00307                 BKE_report(reports, RPT_WARNING, "Cannot move beyond a non-deforming modifier");
00308                 return 0;
00309             }
00310         }
00311 
00312         BLI_remlink(&ob->modifiers, md);
00313         BLI_insertlink(&ob->modifiers, md->next, md);
00314     }
00315 
00316     return 1;
00317 }
00318 
00319 int ED_object_modifier_convert(ReportList *UNUSED(reports), Main *bmain, Scene *scene, Object *ob, ModifierData *md)
00320 {
00321     Object *obn;
00322     ParticleSystem *psys;
00323     ParticleCacheKey *key, **cache;
00324     ParticleSettings *part;
00325     Mesh *me;
00326     MVert *mvert;
00327     MEdge *medge;
00328     int a, k, kmax;
00329     int totvert=0, totedge=0, cvert=0;
00330     int totpart=0, totchild=0;
00331 
00332     if (md->type != eModifierType_ParticleSystem) return 0;
00333     if (ob && ob->mode & OB_MODE_PARTICLE_EDIT) return 0;
00334 
00335     psys=((ParticleSystemModifierData *)md)->psys;
00336     part= psys->part;
00337 
00338     if (part->ren_as != PART_DRAW_PATH || psys->pathcache == NULL)
00339         return 0;
00340 
00341     totpart= psys->totcached;
00342     totchild= psys->totchildcache;
00343 
00344     if (totchild && (part->draw&PART_DRAW_PARENT)==0)
00345         totpart= 0;
00346 
00347     /* count */
00348     cache= psys->pathcache;
00349     for (a=0; a<totpart; a++) {
00350         key= cache[a];
00351 
00352         if (key->steps > 0) {
00353             totvert+= key->steps+1;
00354             totedge+= key->steps;
00355         }
00356     }
00357 
00358     cache= psys->childcache;
00359     for (a=0; a<totchild; a++) {
00360         key= cache[a];
00361 
00362         if (key->steps > 0) {
00363             totvert+= key->steps+1;
00364             totedge+= key->steps;
00365         }
00366     }
00367 
00368     if (totvert==0) return 0;
00369 
00370     /* add new mesh */
00371     obn= add_object(scene, OB_MESH);
00372     me= obn->data;
00373     
00374     me->totvert= totvert;
00375     me->totedge= totedge;
00376     
00377     me->mvert= CustomData_add_layer(&me->vdata, CD_MVERT, CD_CALLOC, NULL, totvert);
00378     me->medge= CustomData_add_layer(&me->edata, CD_MEDGE, CD_CALLOC, NULL, totedge);
00379     me->mface= CustomData_add_layer(&me->fdata, CD_MFACE, CD_CALLOC, NULL, 0);
00380     
00381     mvert= me->mvert;
00382     medge= me->medge;
00383 
00384     /* copy coordinates */
00385     cache= psys->pathcache;
00386     for (a=0; a<totpart; a++) {
00387         key= cache[a];
00388         kmax= key->steps;
00389         for (k=0; k<=kmax; k++,key++,cvert++,mvert++) {
00390             copy_v3_v3(mvert->co,key->co);
00391             if (k) {
00392                 medge->v1= cvert-1;
00393                 medge->v2= cvert;
00394                 medge->flag= ME_EDGEDRAW|ME_EDGERENDER|ME_LOOSEEDGE;
00395                 medge++;
00396             }
00397             else {
00398                 /* cheap trick to select the roots */
00399                 mvert->flag |= SELECT;
00400             }
00401         }
00402     }
00403 
00404     cache=psys->childcache;
00405     for (a=0; a<totchild; a++) {
00406         key=cache[a];
00407         kmax=key->steps;
00408         for (k=0; k<=kmax; k++,key++,cvert++,mvert++) {
00409             copy_v3_v3(mvert->co,key->co);
00410             if (k) {
00411                 medge->v1=cvert-1;
00412                 medge->v2=cvert;
00413                 medge->flag= ME_EDGEDRAW|ME_EDGERENDER|ME_LOOSEEDGE;
00414                 medge++;
00415             }
00416             else {
00417                 /* cheap trick to select the roots */
00418                 mvert->flag |= SELECT;
00419             }
00420         }
00421     }
00422 
00423     DAG_scene_sort(bmain, scene);
00424 
00425     return 1;
00426 }
00427 
00428 static int modifier_apply_shape(ReportList *reports, Scene *scene, Object *ob, ModifierData *md)
00429 {
00430     ModifierTypeInfo *mti= modifierType_getInfo(md->type);
00431 
00432     md->scene= scene;
00433 
00434     if (mti->isDisabled && mti->isDisabled(md, 0)) {
00435         BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Modifier is disabled, skipping apply");
00436         return 0;
00437     }
00438 
00439     /*
00440      * It should be ridiculously easy to extract the original verts that we want
00441      * and form the shape data.  We can probably use the CD KEYINDEX layer (or
00442      * whatever I ended up calling it, too tired to check now), though this would
00443      * by necessity have to make some potentially ugly assumptions about the order
00444      * of the mesh data :-/  you can probably assume in 99% of cases that the first
00445      * element of a given index is the original, and any subsequent duplicates are
00446      * copies/interpolates, but that's an assumption that would need to be tested
00447      * and then predominantly stated in comments in a half dozen headers.
00448      */
00449 
00450     if (ob->type==OB_MESH) {
00451         DerivedMesh *dm;
00452         Mesh *me= ob->data;
00453         Key *key=me->key;
00454         KeyBlock *kb;
00455         
00456         if (!modifier_sameTopology(md) || mti->type == eModifierTypeType_NonGeometrical) {
00457             BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Only deforming modifiers can be applied to Shapes");
00458             return 0;
00459         }
00460         
00461         dm = mesh_create_derived_for_modifier(scene, ob, md, 0);
00462         if (!dm) {
00463             BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Modifier is disabled or returned error, skipping apply");
00464             return 0;
00465         }
00466         
00467         if (key == NULL) {
00468             key= me->key= add_key((ID *)me);
00469             key->type= KEY_RELATIVE;
00470             /* if that was the first key block added, then it was the basis.
00471              * Initialize it with the mesh, and add another for the modifier */
00472             kb= add_keyblock(key, NULL);
00473             mesh_to_key(me, kb);
00474         }
00475 
00476         kb= add_keyblock(key, md->name);
00477         DM_to_meshkey(dm, me, kb);
00478         
00479         dm->release(dm);
00480     }
00481     else {
00482         BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Cannot apply modifier for this object type");
00483         return 0;
00484     }
00485     return 1;
00486 }
00487 
00488 static int modifier_apply_obdata(ReportList *reports, Scene *scene, Object *ob, ModifierData *md)
00489 {
00490     ModifierTypeInfo *mti= modifierType_getInfo(md->type);
00491 
00492     md->scene= scene;
00493 
00494     if (mti->isDisabled && mti->isDisabled(md, 0)) {
00495         BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Modifier is disabled, skipping apply");
00496         return 0;
00497     }
00498 
00499     if (ob->type==OB_MESH) {
00500         DerivedMesh *dm;
00501         Mesh *me = ob->data;
00502         MultiresModifierData *mmd= find_multires_modifier_before(scene, md);
00503 
00504         if (me->key && mti->type != eModifierTypeType_NonGeometrical) {
00505             BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Modifier cannot be applied to Mesh with Shape Keys");
00506             return 0;
00507         }
00508 
00509         /* Multires: ensure that recent sculpting is applied */
00510         if (md->type == eModifierType_Multires)
00511             multires_force_update(ob);
00512 
00513         if (mmd && mmd->totlvl && mti->type==eModifierTypeType_OnlyDeform) {
00514             if (!multiresModifier_reshapeFromDeformMod (scene, mmd, ob, md)) {
00515                 BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Multires modifier returned error, skipping apply");
00516                 return 0;
00517             }
00518         }
00519         else {
00520             dm = mesh_create_derived_for_modifier(scene, ob, md, 1);
00521             if (!dm) {
00522                 BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Modifier returned error, skipping apply");
00523                 return 0;
00524             }
00525 
00526             DM_to_mesh(dm, me, ob);
00527 
00528             dm->release(dm);
00529 
00530             if (md->type == eModifierType_Multires)
00531                 multires_customdata_delete(me);
00532         }
00533     }
00534     else if (ELEM(ob->type, OB_CURVE, OB_SURF)) {
00535         Curve *cu;
00536         int numVerts;
00537         float (*vertexCos)[3];
00538 
00539         if (ELEM(mti->type, eModifierTypeType_Constructive, eModifierTypeType_Nonconstructive)) {
00540             BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Cannot apply constructive modifiers on curve");
00541             return 0;
00542         }
00543 
00544         cu = ob->data;
00545         BKE_report(reports, RPT_INFO, "Applied modifier only changed CV points, not tessellated/bevel vertices");
00546 
00547         vertexCos = curve_getVertexCos(cu, &cu->nurb, &numVerts);
00548         mti->deformVerts(md, ob, NULL, vertexCos, numVerts, 0, 0);
00549         curve_applyVertexCos(cu, &cu->nurb, vertexCos);
00550 
00551         MEM_freeN(vertexCos);
00552 
00553         DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
00554     }
00555     else {
00556         BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Cannot apply modifier for this object type");
00557         return 0;
00558     }
00559 
00560     /* lattice modifier can be applied to particle system too */
00561     if (ob->particlesystem.first) {
00562 
00563         ParticleSystem *psys = ob->particlesystem.first;
00564 
00565         for (; psys; psys=psys->next) {
00566             
00567             if (psys->part->type != PART_HAIR)
00568                 continue;
00569 
00570             psys_apply_hair_lattice(scene, ob, psys);
00571         }
00572     }
00573 
00574     return 1;
00575 }
00576 
00577 int ED_object_modifier_apply(ReportList *reports, Scene *scene, Object *ob, ModifierData *md, int mode)
00578 {
00579     int prev_mode;
00580 
00581     if (scene->obedit) {
00582         BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Modifiers cannot be applied in editmode");
00583         return 0;
00584     }
00585     else if (((ID*) ob->data)->us>1) {
00586         BKE_report(reports, RPT_ERROR, "Modifiers cannot be applied to multi-user data");
00587         return 0;
00588     }
00589 
00590     if (md!=ob->modifiers.first)
00591         BKE_report(reports, RPT_INFO, "Applied modifier was not first, result may not be as expected");
00592 
00593     /* allow apply of a not-realtime modifier, by first re-enabling realtime. */
00594     prev_mode= md->mode;
00595     md->mode |= eModifierMode_Realtime;
00596 
00597     if (mode == MODIFIER_APPLY_SHAPE) {
00598         if (!modifier_apply_shape(reports, scene, ob, md)) {
00599             md->mode= prev_mode;
00600             return 0;
00601         }
00602     }
00603     else {
00604         if (!modifier_apply_obdata(reports, scene, ob, md)) {
00605             md->mode= prev_mode;
00606             return 0;
00607         }
00608     }
00609 
00610     BLI_remlink(&ob->modifiers, md);
00611     modifier_free(md);
00612 
00613     return 1;
00614 }
00615 
00616 int ED_object_modifier_copy(ReportList *UNUSED(reports), Object *ob, ModifierData *md)
00617 {
00618     ModifierData *nmd;
00619     
00620     nmd = modifier_new(md->type);
00621     modifier_copyData(md, nmd);
00622     BLI_insertlink(&ob->modifiers, md, nmd);
00623     modifier_unique_name(&ob->modifiers, nmd);
00624 
00625     return 1;
00626 }
00627 
00628 /************************ add modifier operator *********************/
00629 
00630 static int modifier_add_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00631 {
00632     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
00633     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00634     Object *ob = ED_object_active_context(C);
00635     int type= RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");
00636 
00637     if (!ED_object_modifier_add(op->reports, bmain, scene, ob, NULL, type))
00638         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00639 
00640     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_MODIFIER, ob);
00641     
00642     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00643 }
00644 
00645 static EnumPropertyItem *modifier_add_itemf(bContext *C, PointerRNA *UNUSED(ptr), PropertyRNA *UNUSED(prop), int *free)
00646 {   
00647     Object *ob= ED_object_active_context(C);
00648     EnumPropertyItem *item= NULL, *md_item, *group_item= NULL;
00649     ModifierTypeInfo *mti;
00650     int totitem= 0, a;
00651     
00652     if (!ob)
00653         return modifier_type_items;
00654 
00655     for (a=0; modifier_type_items[a].identifier; a++) {
00656         md_item= &modifier_type_items[a];
00657 
00658         if (md_item->identifier[0]) {
00659             mti= modifierType_getInfo(md_item->value);
00660 
00661             if (mti->flags & eModifierTypeFlag_NoUserAdd)
00662                 continue;
00663 
00664             if (!object_support_modifier_type(ob, md_item->value))
00665                 continue;
00666         }
00667         else {
00668             group_item= md_item;
00669             md_item= NULL;
00670 
00671             continue;
00672         }
00673 
00674         if (group_item) {
00675             RNA_enum_item_add(&item, &totitem, group_item);
00676             group_item= NULL;
00677         }
00678 
00679         RNA_enum_item_add(&item, &totitem, md_item);
00680     }
00681 
00682     RNA_enum_item_end(&item, &totitem);
00683     *free= 1;
00684 
00685     return item;
00686 }
00687 
00688 void OBJECT_OT_modifier_add(wmOperatorType *ot)
00689 {
00690     PropertyRNA *prop;
00691 
00692     /* identifiers */
00693     ot->name = "Add Modifier";
00694     ot->description = "Add a modifier to the active object";
00695     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_modifier_add";
00696     
00697     /* api callbacks */
00698     ot->invoke = WM_menu_invoke;
00699     ot->exec = modifier_add_exec;
00700     ot->poll = ED_operator_object_active_editable;
00701     
00702     /* flags */
00703     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00704     
00705     /* properties */
00706     prop= RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "type", modifier_type_items, eModifierType_Subsurf, "Type", "");
00707     RNA_def_enum_funcs(prop, modifier_add_itemf);
00708     ot->prop = prop;
00709 }
00710 
00711 /************************ generic functions for operators using mod names and data context *********************/
00712 
00713 static int edit_modifier_poll_generic(bContext *C, StructRNA *rna_type, int obtype_flag)
00714 {
00715     PointerRNA ptr= CTX_data_pointer_get_type(C, "modifier", rna_type);
00716     Object *ob= (ptr.id.data)?ptr.id.data:ED_object_active_context(C);
00717     
00718     if (!ob || ob->id.lib) return 0;
00719     if (obtype_flag && ((1<<ob->type) & obtype_flag)==0) return 0;
00720     if (ptr.id.data && ((ID*)ptr.id.data)->lib) return 0;
00721     
00722     return 1;
00723 }
00724 
00725 static int edit_modifier_poll(bContext *C)
00726 {
00727     return edit_modifier_poll_generic(C, &RNA_Modifier, 0);
00728 }
00729 
00730 static void edit_modifier_properties(wmOperatorType *ot)
00731 {
00732     RNA_def_string(ot->srna, "modifier", "", MAX_NAME, "Modifier", "Name of the modifier to edit");
00733 }
00734 
00735 static int edit_modifier_invoke_properties(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00736 {
00737     PointerRNA ptr= CTX_data_pointer_get_type(C, "modifier", &RNA_Modifier);
00738     ModifierData *md;
00739     
00740     if (RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "modifier"))
00741         return 1;
00742     
00743     if (ptr.data) {
00744         md = ptr.data;
00745         RNA_string_set(op->ptr, "modifier", md->name);
00746         return 1;
00747     }
00748     
00749     return 0;
00750 }
00751 
00752 static ModifierData *edit_modifier_property_get(wmOperator *op, Object *ob, int type)
00753 {
00754     char modifier_name[MAX_NAME];
00755     ModifierData *md;
00756     RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "modifier", modifier_name);
00757     
00758     md = modifiers_findByName(ob, modifier_name);
00759     
00760     if (md && type != 0 && md->type != type)
00761         md = NULL;
00762 
00763     return md;
00764 }
00765 
00766 /************************ remove modifier operator *********************/
00767 
00768 static int modifier_remove_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00769 {
00770     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
00771     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00772     Object *ob = ED_object_active_context(C);
00773     ModifierData *md = edit_modifier_property_get(op, ob, 0);
00774     int mode_orig = ob ? ob->mode : 0;
00775     
00776     if (!ob || !md || !ED_object_modifier_remove(op->reports, bmain, scene, ob, md))
00777         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00778 
00779     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_MODIFIER, ob);
00780 
00781     /* if cloth/softbody was removed, particle mode could be cleared */
00782     if (mode_orig & OB_MODE_PARTICLE_EDIT)
00783         if ((ob->mode & OB_MODE_PARTICLE_EDIT)==0)
00784             if (scene->basact && scene->basact->object==ob)
00785                 WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_SCENE|ND_MODE|NS_MODE_OBJECT, NULL);
00786     
00787     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00788 }
00789 
00790 static int modifier_remove_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
00791 {
00792     if (edit_modifier_invoke_properties(C, op))
00793         return modifier_remove_exec(C, op);
00794     else
00795         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00796 }

00808     /* flags */

01028 {

01105 
01106 /****************** multires reshape operator *********************/
01107 
01108 static int multires_reshape_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01109 {
01110     Object *ob= ED_object_active_context(C), *secondob= NULL;
01111     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
01112     MultiresModifierData *mmd = (MultiresModifierData *)edit_modifier_property_get(op, ob, eModifierType_Multires);
01113 
01114     if (!mmd)
01115         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01116 
01117     if (mmd->lvl==0) {
01118         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Reshape can work only with higher levels of subdivisions");
01119         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01120     }
01121 
01122     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Object*, selob, selected_editable_objects) {
01123         if (selob->type == OB_MESH && selob != ob) {
01124             secondob= selob;
01125             break;
01126         }
01127     }
01128     CTX_DATA_END;
01129 
01130     if (!secondob) {
01131         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Second selected mesh object require to copy shape from");
01132         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01133     }
01134 
01135     if (!multiresModifier_reshape(scene, mmd, ob, secondob)) {
01136         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Objects do not have the same number of vertices");
01137         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01138     }
01139 
01140     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
01141     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_MODIFIER, ob);
01142 
01143     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01144 }
01145 
01146 static int multires_reshape_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
01147 {
01148     if (edit_modifier_invoke_properties(C, op))
01149         return multires_reshape_exec(C, op);
01150     else
01151         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01152 }
01153 
01154 void OBJECT_OT_multires_reshape(wmOperatorType *ot)
01155 {
01156     ot->name = "Multires Reshape";
01157     ot->description = "Copy vertex coordinates from other object";
01158     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_multires_reshape";
01159 
01160     ot->poll = multires_poll;
01161     ot->invoke = multires_reshape_invoke;
01162     ot->exec = multires_reshape_exec;
01163     
01164     /* flags */
01165     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01166     edit_modifier_properties(ot);
01167 }
01168 
01169 
01170         
01171 /****************** multires save external operator *********************/
01172 
01173 static int multires_external_save_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01174 {
01175     Object *ob = ED_object_active_context(C);
01176     Mesh *me= (ob)? ob->data: op->customdata;
01177     char path[FILE_MAX];
01178     int relative= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "relative_path");
01179 
01180     if (!me)
01181         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01182 
01183     if (CustomData_external_test(&me->ldata, CD_MDISPS))
01184         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01185     
01186     RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "filepath", path);
01187 
01188     if (relative)
01189         BLI_path_rel(path, G.main->name);
01190 
01191     CustomData_external_add(&me->ldata, &me->id, CD_MDISPS, me->totloop, path);
01192     CustomData_external_write(&me->ldata, &me->id, CD_MASK_MESH, me->totloop, 0);
01193     
01194     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01195 }
01196 
01197 static int multires_external_save_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
01198 {
01199     Object *ob = ED_object_active_context(C);
01200     MultiresModifierData *mmd;
01201     Mesh *me= ob->data;
01202     char path[FILE_MAX];
01203 
01204     if (!edit_modifier_invoke_properties(C, op))
01205         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01206     
01207     mmd = (MultiresModifierData *)edit_modifier_property_get(op, ob, eModifierType_Multires);
01208     
01209     if (!mmd)
01210         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01211     
01212     if (CustomData_external_test(&me->ldata, CD_MDISPS))
01213         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01214 
01215     if (RNA_struct_property_is_set(op->ptr, "filepath"))
01216         return multires_external_save_exec(C, op);
01217     
01218     op->customdata= me;
01219 
01220     BLI_snprintf(path, sizeof(path), "//%s.btx", me->id.name+2);
01221     RNA_string_set(op->ptr, "filepath", path);
01222     
01223     WM_event_add_fileselect(C, op);
01224 
01225     return OPERATOR_RUNNING_MODAL;
01226 }
01227 
01228 void OBJECT_OT_multires_external_save(wmOperatorType *ot)
01229 {
01230     ot->name = "Multires Save External";
01231     ot->description = "Save displacements to an external file";
01232     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_multires_external_save";
01233 
01234     // XXX modifier no longer in context after file browser .. ot->poll = multires_poll;
01235     ot->exec = multires_external_save_exec;
01236     ot->invoke = multires_external_save_invoke;
01237     ot->poll = multires_poll;
01238     
01239     /* flags */
01240     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
01241 
01242     WM_operator_properties_filesel(ot, FOLDERFILE|BTXFILE, FILE_SPECIAL, FILE_SAVE, WM_FILESEL_FILEPATH|WM_FILESEL_RELPATH, FILE_DEFAULTDISPLAY);
01243     edit_modifier_properties(ot);
01244 }

01246 /****************** multires pack operator *********************/

01248 static int multires_external_pack_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
01249 {
01250     Object *ob = ED_object_active_context(C);
01251     Mesh *me= ob->data;
01252

01254         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01255 
01256     // XXX don't remove..
01257     CustomData_external_remove(&me->ldata, &me->id, CD_MDISPS, me->totloop);
01258     
01259     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01260 }

01317 /************************ mdef bind operator *********************/

01323 
01324 static int meshdeform_bind_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01325 {
01326     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
01327     Object *ob = ED_object_active_context(C);
01328     MeshDeformModifierData *mmd = (MeshDeformModifierData *)edit_modifier_property_get(op, ob, eModifierType_MeshDeform);
01329     
01330     if (!mmd)
01331         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01332 
01333     if (mmd->bindcagecos) {
01334         MEM_freeN(mmd->bindcagecos);
01335         if (mmd->dyngrid) MEM_freeN(mmd->dyngrid);
01336         if (mmd->dyninfluences) MEM_freeN(mmd->dyninfluences);
01337         if (mmd->bindinfluences) MEM_freeN(mmd->bindinfluences);
01338         if (mmd->bindoffsets) MEM_freeN(mmd->bindoffsets);
01339         if (mmd->dynverts) MEM_freeN(mmd->dynverts);
01340         if (mmd->bindweights) MEM_freeN(mmd->bindweights); /* deprecated */
01341         if (mmd->bindcos) MEM_freeN(mmd->bindcos); /* deprecated */
01342 
01343         mmd->bindcagecos= NULL;
01344         mmd->dyngrid= NULL;
01345         mmd->dyninfluences= NULL;
01346         mmd->bindoffsets= NULL;
01347         mmd->dynverts= NULL;
01348         mmd->bindweights= NULL; /* deprecated */
01349         mmd->bindcos= NULL; /* deprecated */
01350         mmd->totvert= 0;
01351         mmd->totcagevert= 0;
01352         mmd->totinfluence= 0;
01353         
01354         DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
01355         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_MODIFIER, ob);
01356     }
01357     else {
01358         DerivedMesh *dm;
01359         int mode= mmd->modifier.mode;
01360 
01361         /* force modifier to run, it will call binding routine */
01362         mmd->bindfunc= mesh_deform_bind;
01363         mmd->modifier.mode |= eModifierMode_Realtime;
01364 
01365         if (ob->type == OB_MESH) {
01366             dm= mesh_create_derived_view(scene, ob, 0);
01367             dm->release(dm);
01368         }
01369         else if (ob->type == OB_LATTICE) {
01370             lattice_calc_modifiers(scene, ob);
01371         }
01372         else if (ob->type==OB_MBALL) {
01373             makeDispListMBall(scene, ob);
01374         }
01375         else if (ELEM3(ob->type, OB_CURVE, OB_SURF, OB_FONT)) {
01376             makeDispListCurveTypes(scene, ob, 0);
01377         }
01378 
01379         mmd->bindfunc= NULL;
01380         mmd->modifier.mode= mode;
01381     }
01382     
01383     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01384 }
01385 
01386 static int meshdeform_bind_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
01387 {
01388     if (edit_modifier_invoke_properties(C, op))
01389         return meshdeform_bind_exec(C, op);
01390     else 
01391         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01392 }

01418 static int explode_refresh_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)

01427 
01428     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
01429     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_MODIFIER, ob);
01430

01459 /****************** ocean bake operator *********************/
01460 
01461 static int ocean_bake_poll(bContext *C)
01462 {
01463     return edit_modifier_poll_generic(C, &RNA_OceanModifier, 0);
01464 }
01465 
01466 /* copied from init_ocean_modifier, MOD_ocean.c */
01467 static void init_ocean_modifier_bake(struct Ocean *oc, struct OceanModifierData *omd)
01468 {
01469     int do_heightfield, do_chop, do_normals, do_jacobian;
01470     
01471     if (!omd || !oc) return; 
01472     
01473     do_heightfield = TRUE;
01474     do_chop = (omd->chop_amount > 0);
01475     do_normals = (omd->flag & MOD_OCEAN_GENERATE_NORMALS);
01476     do_jacobian = (omd->flag & MOD_OCEAN_GENERATE_FOAM);
01477     
01478     BKE_init_ocean(oc, omd->resolution*omd->resolution, omd->resolution*omd->resolution, omd->spatial_size, omd->spatial_size, 
01479                    omd->wind_velocity, omd->smallest_wave, 1.0, omd->wave_direction, omd->damp, omd->wave_alignment, 
01480                    omd->depth, omd->time,
01481                    do_heightfield, do_chop, do_normals, do_jacobian,
01482                    omd->seed);
01483 }
01484 
01485 typedef struct OceanBakeJob {
01486     /* from wmJob */
01487     void *owner;
01488     short *stop, *do_update;
01489     float *progress;
01490     int current_frame;
01491     struct OceanCache *och;
01492     struct Ocean *ocean;
01493     struct OceanModifierData *omd;
01494 } OceanBakeJob;
01495 
01496 static void oceanbake_free(void *customdata)
01497 {
01498     OceanBakeJob *oj= customdata;
01499     MEM_freeN(oj);
01500 }
01501 
01502 /* called by oceanbake, only to check job 'stop' value */
01503 static int oceanbake_breakjob(void *UNUSED(customdata))
01504 {
01505     //OceanBakeJob *ob= (OceanBakeJob *)customdata;
01506     //return *(ob->stop);
01507     
01508     /* this is not nice yet, need to make the jobs list template better 
01509      * for identifying/acting upon various different jobs */
01510     /* but for now we'll reuse the render break... */
01511     return (G.afbreek);
01512 }
01513 
01514 /* called by oceanbake, wmJob sends notifier */
01515 static void oceanbake_update(void *customdata, float progress, int *cancel)
01516 {
01517     OceanBakeJob *oj= customdata;
01518     
01519     if (oceanbake_breakjob(oj))
01520         *cancel = 1;
01521     
01522     *(oj->do_update)= 1;
01523     *(oj->progress)= progress;
01524 }
01525 
01526 static void oceanbake_startjob(void *customdata, short *stop, short *do_update, float *progress)
01527 {
01528     OceanBakeJob *oj= customdata;
01529     
01530     oj->stop= stop;
01531     oj->do_update = do_update;
01532     oj->progress = progress;
01533     
01534     G.afbreek= 0;   /* XXX shared with render - replace with job 'stop' switch */
01535     
01536     BKE_bake_ocean(oj->ocean, oj->och, oceanbake_update, (void *)oj);
01537     
01538     *do_update= 1;
01539     *stop = 0;
01540 }
01541 
01542 static void oceanbake_endjob(void *customdata)
01543 {
01544     OceanBakeJob *oj= customdata;
01545     
01546     if (oj->ocean) {
01547         BKE_free_ocean(oj->ocean);
01548         oj->ocean = NULL;
01549     }
01550     
01551     oj->omd->oceancache = oj->och;
01552     oj->omd->cached = TRUE;
01553 }
01554 
01555 static int ocean_bake_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
01556 {
01557     Object *ob = ED_object_active_context(C);
01558     OceanModifierData *omd = (OceanModifierData *)edit_modifier_property_get(op, ob, eModifierType_Ocean);
01559     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
01560     OceanCache *och;
01561     struct Ocean *ocean;
01562     int f, cfra, i=0;
01563     int free= RNA_boolean_get(op->ptr, "free");
01564     
01565     wmJob *steve;
01566     OceanBakeJob *oj;
01567     
01568     if (!omd)
01569         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01570     
01571     if (free) {
01572         omd->refresh |= MOD_OCEAN_REFRESH_CLEAR_CACHE;
01573         DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
01574         WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_MODIFIER, ob);
01575         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01576     }
01577 
01578     och = BKE_init_ocean_cache(omd->cachepath, modifier_path_relbase(ob),
01579                                omd->bakestart, omd->bakeend, omd->wave_scale,
01580                                omd->chop_amount, omd->foam_coverage, omd->foam_fade, omd->resolution);
01581     
01582     och->time = MEM_mallocN(och->duration*sizeof(float), "foam bake time");
01583     
01584     cfra = scene->r.cfra;
01585     
01586     /* precalculate time variable before baking */
01587     for (f=omd->bakestart; f<=omd->bakeend; f++) {
01588         /* from physics_fluid.c:
01589          *
01590          * XXX: This can't be used due to an anim sys optimization that ignores recalc object animation,
01591          * leaving it for the depgraph (this ignores object animation such as modifier properties though... :/ )
01592          * --> BKE_animsys_evaluate_all_animation(G.main, eval_time);
01593          * This doesn't work with drivers:
01594          * --> BKE_animsys_evaluate_animdata(&fsDomain->id, fsDomain->adt, eval_time, ADT_RECALC_ALL);
01595          */
01596         
01597         /* Modifying the global scene isn't nice, but we can do it in 
01598          * this part of the process before a threaded job is created */
01599         
01600         //scene->r.cfra = f;
01601         //ED_update_for_newframe(CTX_data_main(C), scene, CTX_wm_screen(C), 1);
01602         
01603         /* ok, this doesn't work with drivers, but is way faster. 
01604          * let's use this for now and hope nobody wants to drive the time value... */
01605         BKE_animsys_evaluate_animdata(scene, (ID *)ob, ob->adt, f, ADT_RECALC_ANIM);
01606         
01607         och->time[i] = omd->time;
01608         i++;
01609     }
01610     
01611     /* make a copy of ocean to use for baking - threadsafety */
01612     ocean = BKE_add_ocean();
01613     init_ocean_modifier_bake(ocean, omd);
01614     
01615 #if 0
01616      BKE_bake_ocean(ocean, och);
01617     
01618     omd->oceancache = och;
01619     omd->cached = TRUE;
01620     
01621     scene->r.cfra = cfra;
01622     
01623     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
01624     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_MODIFIER, ob);
01625 #endif
01626     
01627     /* job stuff */
01628     
01629     scene->r.cfra = cfra;
01630     
01631     /* setup job */
01632     steve= WM_jobs_get(CTX_wm_manager(C), CTX_wm_window(C), scene, "Ocean Simulation", WM_JOB_PROGRESS);
01633     oj= MEM_callocN(sizeof(OceanBakeJob), "ocean bake job");
01634     oj->ocean = ocean;
01635     oj->och = och;
01636     oj->omd = omd;
01637     
01638     WM_jobs_customdata(steve, oj, oceanbake_free);
01639     WM_jobs_timer(steve, 0.1, NC_OBJECT|ND_MODIFIER, NC_OBJECT|ND_MODIFIER);
01640     WM_jobs_callbacks(steve, oceanbake_startjob, NULL, NULL, oceanbake_endjob);
01641     
01642     WM_jobs_start(CTX_wm_manager(C), steve);
01643     
01644     
01645     
01646     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
01647 }
01648 
01649 static int ocean_bake_invoke(bContext *C, wmOperator *op, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
01650 {
01651     if (edit_modifier_invoke_properties(C, op))
01652         return ocean_bake_exec(C, op);
01653     else
01654         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
01655 }
